description: Try our easy to follow Coco Nutty And Chia Breakfast Pudding With Fresh Berries recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve chilled. Note: Berries can be replaced with sliced mango or other seasonal fruit.
